name: Randomised Dungeon
description:
A retro looking maze, where you have to kill monster and find the keys to doors to progress further. You play as the cube. It has the cool retro looking Black and White Effect.

This game features randomly generated maze with keys and monster placed randomly. The game also has mini-boss and boss fight every maze.

The game was made for Procedural Generation Game Jam in 2014. #procjam

The game is still not complete and is a little buggy, you might have to restart the game sometimes due to some glitches.

Jam link : http://itch.io/jam/procjam

You can even use the Xbox Controller to play the game.

Controls for the game :

WASD/Arrow keys -- Movement

Mouse - Look Around

Mouse button/Left control -- Shoot

I am open to suggestions and feedbacks. Thank you for taking a look at the game.
